content: I submitted a branch against the build but apparently not against R4B. I checked out R4B and created my branch against R4B but must not have the right git command to commit and push against a specific branch. Anyone know the command line git command to do that?
I think this is the same as what I am stuck with https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179306-github/topic/Push.20to.20R4B
Didn't know there was a git stream. THanks for the pointer!
@David Pyke please see the response I posted in the thread Rik linked above. If you have further questions please let me know
